cs.DM, cs.AI, cs.CC, cs.LG, cs.SI 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) - The paper deals with the Ising model, which is a well-known topic in discrete mathematics. The paper also discusses the use of dynamic programming for solving exact inference and exact sampling, which is a common technique in discrete mathematics. 
2. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper discusses the use of graphical models for solving inference and sampling problems, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence. The paper also discusses the use of polynomial-time algorithms, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence. 
3. cs.CC (Computational Complexity) - The paper discusses the complexity of the Ising model and presents a new family of tractable graphical models. The paper also discusses the use of polynomial-time algorithms for solving inference and sampling problems, which is a common topic in computational complexity. 
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper discusses the use of graphical models for solving inference and sampling problems, which is a common topic in machine learning. The paper also discusses the use of polynomial-time algorithms, which is a common technique in machine learning.
